Topic.Title: AMZN Candles

Message.Msg: shorting_amazon: "Upside volume noticeably absent while downside volume huge." Very positive for longs. Here's why: 1. Who would buy when a stock is noticeably weak and going down? Higher volume means some serious people are buying. 2. Who would sell when a stock is going up? Lower volume means not many people want to sell because they believe the price is going higher. You follow, shorts? I advise you to use your brains some times instead of always acting on your herd instinct, following the price lower.

Topic.Title: Releax, shorts. As long as she remains below $258.63 . . .

Message.Msg: These calls get silly on both sides. The shorts were idiots according to the longs when the stock rose up above $275 going onto earnings. The next day the stock is down $20 in one session and then closes below it's 200DMA 3 days later and the shorts are geniuses and calling the longs idiots. It will never close above it's 200DMA anytime soon some say. Well that lasted for 1 day. Of course the market has been a great help but it is what it is. Is this just some retracement or a real move? Well traders can trade it up long while bear traders look for retracement entry levels. This just tells me that you don't get in at the top or out at the bottom if you are short and vice versa long. If you want to trade it you can but if you are a pig you will have your gains eaten into. Now if you are a long term bear or bull that's a different story. Good luck.

Topic.Title: Looks like fido and cap world aint front running this pig no more

Message.Msg: It's not going to end good either way. One you will have high inflation and goods will cost an arm and a leg so your paper gains and measly wage will be well spent. Two they OD on the debt and we have defaults everywhere which means deflation. Market will tanks of course but so does everything else. There will be a fork on the road soon that either lead to inflation or deflation IMO. Most of fiats will be toasted probably so shall we say a new currency is coming courtesy of the NWO? While we could even get a new currency with deflation if there's two much chaos and they need something new to reset the system. PM will be good for bartering but I have no clue what the final value will be when all is said and done. We are not in a sustainable path for so many decades now. It is very scary what will happen next. Though certain breakthroughs and tech advances will offset the severity somewhat.

Topic.Title: Look out over yonder from the hieghts of a mkt blowoff top

Message.Msg: Sybs, It sure looks like a classic blow off top, but it maybe a few days before we know for sure. I was watching the carnival barkers on CNBC this am and they were getting all warm and fuzzy about a 15K beat on the jobs report, like unemployment had come down to 5%. You remember when 400K jobs was a GOOD jobs report!? They sold this today like Cabbage Patch Kids on Christmas Eve....they will be worth 24.99 on the 26th of Dec. - PJ

Topic.Title: Who is the their right mind would buy this stock over $50?

Message.Msg: Mutual fund managers and hedge fund guys use other people's money. They could care less about valuation.They are the ones buying this stock. They will be the first ones out the door when reality hits this scam and individual investors (longs) will be holding the bag.

Topic.Title: Look out over yonder from the hieghts of a mkt blowoff top

Message.Msg: The bulls think they can't go wrong. They think the economy is improving and Ben said he will print forever. What could possibly go wrong? That sure sounds like a top to me.
